N = int(input())
A = list(map(int,input().split()))

B = [0]*N
B[0] = A[0]
B[-1] = A[-1]

for i in range(1,N):
    B[i] = A[i] - A[i-1]
print(sum(B))

N = int(input())
B = list(map(int,input().split()))

#A = [0]*N
A = [0]*N

A[0] = B[0]
A[-1] = B[-1]

for i in range(1,N-1):
    A[i] = B[i] - A[i-1]

print(sum(A))
n = int(input())
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

a = []

for i in range(n-1):
    if b[i] <= b[i+1]:
        a.append(b[i])
    else:
        a.append(b[i+1])

a.append(b[n-1])

print(sum(a))

n = int(input())  # input number of elements
b = list(map(int, input().split()))  # input numbers

a = []  # list for storing the answer

for i in range(n - 1):
    if b[i] <= b[i + 1]:
        a.append(b[i])
    else:
        a.append(b[i + 1])

a.append(b[n - 2])

print(sum(a))

#!/usr/bin/env python3

# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc039/submissions/17016764


import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))

    a = []

    for i in range(n-1):
        if b[i] <= b[i+1]:
            a.append(b[i])
        else:
            a.append(b[i+1])

    a.append(b[n-2])

    print(sum(a))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
# coding: utf-8


n = int(input())  # 数字を入力
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

b = []
c = []

for i in range(n):
    if i % 2 == 0:
        b.append(a[i])
    else:
        c.append(a[i])

if len(b) > len(c):
    print(sum(b[:-1]))
elif len(c) > len(b):
    print(sum(c[:-1]))
else:
    print(sum(b))
